articles.title: Putin’s Vengeful Threat As G7 Finalises Loaning Kyiv With $50 Billion Frozen Russian Assets - The Times of India
articles.description: Russia has issued a stern warning to the European Union, threatening a painful response if the EU utilizes frozen Russian assets to fund Ukraine. Russian Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Maria Zakharova emphasized that such actions would prompt a harsh
